description: Abbreviated identifier for the priority level used in requests, work orders, or assets.
Human-readable label for the priority level.
Optional notes or business rules about the priority.
Numeric sequence used to control display or processing order of priorities.
User or system account that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User or system account that last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent modification.
Number of days promised to complete or respond to items with this priority; drives SLA planning.
Indicator whether this priority can be applied to asset records (Y/N).
Display style reference, such as a color or CSS class, used to highlight this priority in the user interface.
